title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Learn all about Theodore Roosevelt!               Check out our section specifically for kids!               From birds to bison, learn about park wildlife               Explore the geology of North Dakota's badlands         Â    Use the links below, or the navigation on the left side of your screen, to learn more about the park.  News Find press releases, stay connected through social media, and browse our visitor guide online.   Photos and Multimedia Browse our photo galleries, watch a movie about the park, or check out our webcam!   History & Culture Visit this section to learn about the people and places of Theodore Roosevelt National Park.   Nature Find out what types of plants and animals call the park home, or explore the varied geology and ecosytems of the park.   Education Use the national park as your classroom! Check out this section for teacher resources and education materials.   Kids & Youth Researching a school project? Want to become a Junior Ranger? Come discover all the cool things for kids at the park!   Management Curious about how your national park is managed? Look here for information on our laws, policies and regulations which guide our park management team.   Bookstore Find information about our cooperating association and the products they sell in the visitor centers.
